, C_RUN_PIC_ID , C_REMARK_RESPONSIBLE_NAME , C_MACHINE_PERSON_NAME , C_CHANGE_SIGNER_ID,C_RUN_MANAGER_ID,C_RUN_MANAGER_NAME,C_STOP_MANAGER_ID,C_STOP_MANAGER_NAME,
